title: Security Policy Governance
description: Maintain and review core information security policies with named approvers.

title: Risk Register Maintenance
description: Keep an active risk register with treatment decisions and due dates.

title: Asset Classification
description: Classify key assets and assign owners for accountability.

title: Access Control Policy
description: Define access rules for business roles and privileged accounts.

title: Authentication Strength
description: Apply strong authentication controls for sensitive workflows.

title: Cryptographic Key Operations
description: Document key creation, rotation, and retirement practices.

title: Operational Procedure Control
description: Keep security operating procedures current and tested.

title: Logging and Event Oversight
description: Review event logs and define retention requirements.

title: Vulnerability Management
description: Track vulnerabilities through remediation and closure.

title: Secure Change Management
description: Evaluate security impact for changes before deployment.

title: Supplier Security Management
description: Assess supplier security posture and contractual requirements.

title: Incident Handling Workflow
description: Use documented incident handling steps and escalation paths.

title: Business Continuity Planning
description: Maintain continuity procedures for critical services.

title: Compliance Evidence Tracking
description: Collect evidence for mandatory obligations and assessments.

title: Internal Audit Cadence
description: Run internal security audits on a scheduled basis.

title: Management Review Cycle
description: Review security objectives and outcomes with leadership.

title: Security Awareness Tracking
description: Measure completion and quality of awareness activities.

title: Physical Access Safeguards
description: Control physical entry to sensitive work areas.

title: Data Retention and Disposal
description: Apply retention and secure disposal rules for data sets.

title: Control Improvement Backlog
description: Track improvement actions and verify completion.
